segments.text: A tow truck was towing my car and put all those dents in my car .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Are they going to pay you for the damages ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: They're saying it was already there .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What the hell . That doesn't make sense . What are you going to do ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I have to go to court . A cop was there so he can prove that the damage wasn't there .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That sucks . I'd be pissed if that happened to me .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I got an estimate and it's four thousand dollars .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh my gosh . Damn ... screw the court , I would burn down their store .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We'll see what happens after court .
segments.speaker: S2
